item.description:
Revolve Nation is proud to present the latest in our monthly CEO Breakfast Discussion Series! We are proud to welcome this month's speaker, Timothy Armour, President & CEO of the Cure Alzheimer's Fund (www.curealzfund.org). Tim is a serial entrepreneur with extensive experience with start up businesses as well as non-profit organization. He will speak to us about the particular nuances associated with NPO start ups and his professional journey.

Schedule:
-7:00am-7:30am: Networking/Continental Breakfast
-7:30am-8:10am: Special Guest lecture on his journey and employment matters, plus a Q&A roundtable discussion about the topic
-8:10am-8:30am: Networking

Revolve Nation is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more! Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs. Coffee and Doughnuts will be served!

Like anything in life, what you put into a networking group is what you get out of it. Revolve Nation is designed for entrepreneurs and professionals who are serious about building their business, investing in relationships, and helping each other to succeed. You will get the most out of this group with regular attendance.


SPONSORS:
Revolve, Inc: www.revolvethis.com
Exemplar Law Partners: www.exemplarlaw.com

See all of you next time!
item.name: Sunrise Meeting: Revolve Nation CEO Breakfast!!!
